wikipedia_page.main: Ahmad Hussain (Urdu: احمد حسین; born 9 November 1981) is a British-Pakistani faith inspired singer-songwriter, executive, producer of Kashmiri-Pakistani descent. He is the founder and managing director of IQRA Promotions. He is also a humanitarian who is widely known for utilising his musical talent to support charitable projects the world over.

response: *I Turn to You, a 2010 album by Ahmad Hussain
